title: Bug 19458 - [Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: The Copy Project dialog in Navigator has UI problems. The text 'this is in red text' appears in red color.
OB: When choosing the project name as 'test', a static text validation error is displayed on the dialog.
EB: If I uncheck the default location checkbox, the default location should remain in the edit box and not be cleared. The text should be displayed in black and there should be a small error icon for on-the-fly validation.
SR: Fix the UI problems in the Copy Project dialog in Navigator.
